summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a witness, referred to as [REDACTED], conducted on November 4, 2019. The witness describes her recruitment as a minor by a friend, her own sexualized massage with Jeffrey Epstein, and her subsequent role for approximately two years in recruiting other underage girls for Epstein, facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell. The document details the recruitment process, payments, and the witness's awareness of the girls' ages.

persons.name: Rita Glavin
persons.context: Present as an attorney for the witness during the FBI interview.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexual abuse. The witness describes giving him a massage where he acted inappropriately, and details his system of paying for underage girls to be brought to him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'GMAX' in the document. Described as the primary point of contact for scheduling appointments and recruiting girls for Epstein. The witness states she only interacted with Maxwell about appointments.

persons.name: Zach Brian
persons.context: Informed the witness about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein on June 22, 2006.

connections.description: Maxwell acted as the scheduler and recruiter, contacting the witness to arrange for girls to be brought to Epstein for massages.
The witness was recruited as a minor, gave Epstein a massage where he acted sexually, and was then recruited to bring other girls to him.
Maxwell was the primary contact who called the witness to schedule appointments and instruct her to bring girls to Epstein.
A friend (name redacted) initially recruited the witness when she was 16, telling her she could make money from a billionaire friend in Palm Beach.

events.title: Witness's Initial Recruitment and Abuse
events.description: At age 16, the witness is recruited by a friend to meet Jeffrey Epstein for a 'massage.' During the massage, Epstein acts inappropriately, masturbates, and proposes she bring friends for money.

events.title: Witness's Recruitment Period
events.description: For approximately two years (ages 16-18), the witness recruited other underage girls for Epstein, facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell. She estimates bringing girls 12-24 times.

events.title: Witness Brings Final Girl Who Complains
events.description: When the witness was 18, she brought a girl (name redacted) who subsequently made a complaint, causing the witness to stop bringing girls.

events.title: Witness Learns of Investigation
events.description: The witness hears from Zach Brian about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. She recalls the date because it was two days prior to a friend (name redacted) being murdered.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: The witness is interviewed by the FBI in West Palm Beach, Florida, with her attorney Rita Glavin present.

keyFacts: The witness was recruited at age 16 by a friend to meet Jeffrey Epstein for a paid 'massage,' which involved sexual acts.
For about two years (ages 16-18), the witness recruited other underage girls for Epstein, estimating 12-24 visits, with Ghislaine Maxwell as the primary scheduler.
The witness instructed the girls she recruited to tell Epstein they were 18 years old, and she was aware the girls were typically young-looking, thin, and flat-chested, with some as young as 14.
Payment was made directly by Epstein in his study after each appointment; the witness was paid $200 for each girl she brought.
The witness's recruitment activity stopped when a girl she brought at age 18 made a complaint, which coincided with the witness learning of the police investigation in June 2006.
